GENERAL.NOTIFICATION: Press ~y~{0}~w~ to get the VIP to follow you.
When possible, ~o~evacuate the VIP~w~ to the station!
The ~r~VIP is dead.~w~ ~y~Fight off the remaining enemies~w~ and handle the situation as you see fit!
Get closer to the ~p~VIP~w~ to tell them to ~g~follow you~w~.
An ~r~unidentified helicopter~w~ is entering nearby airspace.

OUTCOME.FURTHERINFORMATION: The VIP's security detail is ~r~under attack~w~. Help ~y~neutralise the threats~w~ and await further instructions!
OUTCOME.NOTIFICATION: ~g~Protect the VIP!~w~ Dispatch will provide more instructions once the scene is under control.

OUTCOME.FURTHERINFORMATION: The VIP's security detail has been ~r~eliminated~w~. Rescue the VIP who has been ~y~taken hostage~w~.
OUTCOME.NOTIFICATION: Try to ~y~approach the VIP~w~ without ~o~being spotted by the armed attackers~w~.
~r~You've been spotted~w~. ~g~Protect the VIP~w~ who will now be ~o~targeted by the attackers~w~.
